attributes.action: Demand Hazel Blears steps down from MP for Salford and resigns from Politics
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We the undersigned, declare that Hazel Blears is unfit to serve as MP for Salford.
We demand she steps down from office immediately until a suitable candidate can be found.

rejection.details: Petitions to the Number 10 site should request an action that can be taken by the Prime Minister or Government. The Prime Minister cannot remove MPs in his role as PM. It is a party issue and you should contact the Labour Party or Gordon Brown as an MP.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
